transcript.title: UNKNOWN
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER
FOR MEDIA16 DECEMBER 1987
Unfortunately, Geoff marsh is unavailable for the Prime
Minister's XI match at Manuka on 23 December.
In his place, Laurie Sawle and I have selected Greg Matthews
of New South Wales to play in the side. I am sure ACT
cricket fans will appreciate another opportunity to see
this entertaining and talented cricketer, who has been in
very good form this season. 0034165
